channel.title: my/DND/campaigns/import_campaign on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in my/DND/campaigns/import_campaign on tlake.io

item.description: Summary The party’s escape from the tower stalls with the realization that they are unable to teleport all of their summoned creatures to safety. Knowing Fierna could locate them any moment, some hard decisions are made at the expense of Zed’s minotaur friends, and the Menagerie finally teleports away.

Summary Having dispatched the remaining guards in the corridor, the party resumes its search for Magrin. They find a room with six pillars, adorned with piles of teeth–apparently some ghastly connection to Gelfondi’s machine room found earlier.

Summary Alone and defiant, Finn squares up against the incoming bone devil and its guard. She is swiftly restrained by a chain devil, and Finn summons her signature flumphs in retribution, but this does not stop the bone devil from savagely attacking Finn with its claws and hideous stinger.

Summary The party carefully creeps along the southern corridor towards the west, hoping to avoid further detection. At the sight of a bone devil ahead, Zed and his minotaurs instead choose to (somehow) squeeze into a small alcove towards the center of the tower, where they uncover two hidden imps keeping watch.

item.title: Gelfondi
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Gelfondi The devil in charge of the operations on the 42nd floor of Fierna’s tower. Description Appearance Gelfondi is a horned devil, slightly shorter than usual. He was wearing some type or robes when the party surprised him in 2022-02-02 Import Campaign.
Summary The party desperately tries to dispatch the the two horned devils and subordinate in the main corridor before the devils can alert the guard barracks and the rest of the tower.

item.title: Clear Wind
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Clear Wind A tabaxi bartender at the Moonlight All-Night Diner in Shadow Leilon. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Val Val is chatty with Clear Wind and calls her “Water Wendy”.

item.title: Denarial
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Denarial A sorceress and leader of a large contingent of drow in Shadow Leilon. Description Appearance A female drow. Personality Biography Key Info Denarial desires to take over as mayor of Shadow Leilon.

item.title: Elirion'tar
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Elirion’tar Brother to Val and was fround working on a ship docked in Neverwinter. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Said he was on way to Chult and said the party could meet him later.

item.title: Aeortis
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Aeortis An apparent young girl who designed much Fierna’s tower. Description Appearance a (supposed) young girl, accompanied by three hellhounds Personality Biography Relationships Oneshoe In payment for giving information to the party, Aeortis required the party to perform a service for her and retrieve a particular soul coin from Fierna’s tower.

item.title: Belial
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Belial Belial is the lord of Phlegethos, who jointly rules the fourth layer together with his daughter Fierna. This unusual partnership was allowed by Asmodeus as an exception to the usual requirement of one ruler per layer.

item.title: Carmen
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Carmen Known as one of the most powerful and effective lawyers in Phlegethos. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Due to her extraordinary reputation, Carmen commands exceedingly high fees for her services.

item.title: Cassandra Belacourt
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Cassandra Belacourt Agent of The Reclamation – a party which seeks to reclaim artifacts that should not be out in the wild. Description Appearance A female drow.

item.title: Fierna
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Fierna Daughter of Belial, with whom she co-rules Phlegethos. Description Appearance Personality Described as fiery and even recklessly passionate. Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Magrin
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Magrin A duergar who serves served as a chief manager of Tymphal’s operations. Description Appearance Initial Meeting in the Torture Room at Fierna’s Tower a now frail and despondent duergar, heavily beaten and lacking teeth After Tymphal’s Punishment Magrin’s essence is now confined within a green steel shield.

item.title: Melkor
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Melkor Contact that used to work at the tower Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Nyx
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Nyx Gimble’s older sister, a rock gnome who is also gifted in Divination. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Growing up, Gimble was told he was an only child.

item.title: Oberon
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Oberon Oberon, Lord of Beasts, consort of Queen Titania, and member of the Seelie Court. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Incensed by the assassination attempt on Queen Titania that left her comatose, Oberon has been leading an unending form of The Wild Hunt.

item.title: Psithyron
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Psithyron An imp which still remains in the service of Horns, back from when Horns was a general of Hell. Description Appearance Personality Impish. Biography Key Info Early on in the campaign, Psithyron manifested as a small, devilish figure that Horns had with him when he washed ashore on the beach and Reidoth found him.

item.title: Queen Titania
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Queen Titania Archfey and queen of the Summer Court of the Feywild. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info While the party visited the Court of Stars, they witnessed an assassination attempt on Queen Titania which left her gravely injured.

item.title: Quilnorie
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Quilnorie Reportedly an elvish paladin whose soul ended up in a Soul Coin in Fierna’s tower. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Aeortis issues a quest for Oneshoe to retrieve the coin with the soul of Quilnorie.

item.title: Tymphal
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Tymphal A duke of Phlegethos, Tymphal was a mechanical master smith whose lesser devil legions and hundreds of duergar slaves toiled in a volcano forge to produce weapons and infernal constructs.

item.title: Veshvor
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Veshvor A patron of The Brimstone who crossed Magnanomy. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Veshvor won a special necklace from Magnanomy. Magnanomy took offense to Veshvor’s behavior and asked Rinn’thalas to secure the return of the necklace in exchange for some information.

item.title: Waybert Spinzig
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Waybert Spinzig A gnome researcher who arrived in Phandalin along with Zilry to study the incoming Modron March. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Zilry Zilry is a companion who joins in Wayberts’s study.

item.title: Wrath the Chain Devil
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Wrath the Chain Devil A powerful chain devil who reportedly may know something about the whereabouts of Ze’brak. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Magnanomy claimed that Ze’brak may have drawn the ire of Wrath.

item.title: Zarinor
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Zarinor A white dragon, found bound in chains on the 42nd-floor during the Caper at Fierna’s Tower. Description Appearance Large-sized, white dragon. Personality Abnormally docile and intelligent for a smaller white dragon.

item.title: Zilry
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Zilry An elf researcher who arrived in Phandalin along with Waybert to study the incoming Modron March. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Waybert Spinzig Waybert is a companion who joins in Zilry’s study.

Summary After the relative success last session stealthily clearing out the southeastern perimeter of the tower, the party initially follows a similar tactic: luring guards in small groups into the library to be dispatched quietly.

item.title: Magnanomy
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Magnanomy A regular patron of the The Brimstone, who seems to traffic in information. Description Looks to be a tiefling-ish, higher-class gentleman. Biography Key Info Magnanomy is fond of gambling.

Summary Oneshoe took point leading the party as they explored the first set of rooms along the perimeter of the tower going from Southwest corner counterclockwise towards the East. They find some torture victims and survive the activation of a devious torture chamber themselves.

Summary Another day at court for Horns’ trial. This time, the prosecution calls Val to the stand. This does not go well for Horns. Later, the party learns that Horns has been secretly hoarding a large stash of soul coins since Avernus.
Summary Rinn’thalas learns about cake. Ignaraz meets the party to discuss the upcoming Caper at Fierna’s Tower. Rinn leads a few members of the party in some late-night teambuilding through larceny.

Summary After spending some time with the stone giant Keith Stone, the party continues gathering intel for their Caper at Fierna’s Tower. They speak with Melkor and later Aeortis, who gives them detailed information about the tower’s construction in exchange for a new contract to retrieve something extra from the tower.

item.title: Ocean's Oneshoe
item.description: Summary Zed receives news of the Feywild from an old friend before he is later served up as part of a “cake” buffet delivery to Carmen. The party is approached with an offer of work to pay off Carmen’s hefty fee to defend Horns, but it requires making another deal with a devil.

item.title: Caerwyn Cadogan
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Caerwyn Cadogan A tuathan from the Feywild–once friend and a guide to the realm, now enemy after his betrayal at the Court of Stars. Description Appearance A handsome, anthromorphic fox.

item.title: Dilemma at the Aboleth's Lair
item.description: Gimble the Diviner Dilemma at the Aboleth’s Lair In Shadow Leilon, Gimble was finally able to locate his missing sister and aunt in the depths of the aboleth’s lair in 2019-08-09 Import Campaign.

item.title: Finn
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Finn Halfling Barbarian (D&D Beyond) the “conjurer” #LowIntLifeLessons friend to Not-Bailey don’t ask about Bailey Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Gimble Became Lawful Evil in Avernus
item.description: Gimble the Diviner Gimble Became Lawful Evil in Avernus After being dragged to Hell (literally) by the party, Gimble eventually succumbed to the pernicious nature of Avernus and shifted to a lawful evil outlook.

item.title: Gimble prepares special defensive magic for Finn
item.description: Gimble the Diviner Gimble prepares special defensive magic for Finn When Gimble Became Lawful Evil in Avernus, he new he had to leave the Hells. However, his lingering friendship with Finn compelled him to first make some special castings into his Ioun stone and give it to Finn, hoping it would help keep her safe.

item.title: Gimble the Diviner
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Gimble the Diviner gnome wizard (D&D Beyond) “the diviner” moral compass always flustered family matters Description Appearance Gimble is a rock gnome standing just over three feet tall.

item.title: Gimble the Diviner
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Gimble the Diviner gnome wizard (D&D Beyond) “the diviner” moral compass always flustered family matters Description Appearance Gimble is a rock gnome standing just over three feet tall.

item.title: Gimble the Diviner Backstory
item.description: Gimble the Diviner Gimble the Diviner Backstory Formatted Gimble the Diviner Backstory – Formatted Text Version Gimble seeks to unravel the mystery of a strange, blank book and its connection to his lost sister.

item.title: Gorstag
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Gorstag human fighter (D&D Beyond) trans-dimensional gambling baron rolls with anything occasional corrective community service portal technology: unknown Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Grale
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Grale half-orc monk/ranger (D&D Beyond) like, three Narutos, and also a Goku shadow run (but not like the rpg) stuns for days biggus stickus Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Gundren Rockseeker
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Gundren Rockseeker Gundren Rockseeker was one of the three dwarf brothers who rediscovered Wave Echo Cave. Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Late Brothers brother to Tharden Rockseeker older brother to Nundro Rockseeker Val Gundren and Val become fast friends and drinking buddies.

item.title: Haeltin Var Astora
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Haeltin Var Astora half-drow blood hunter (D&D Beyond) goes by “Grey” formerly Haeltin Var Astora formerly a paladin formerly deceased anime werewolf motorcycle boi Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Alter egos Jared Gray took on the persona of “Jared” several times in the Sword Coast.

item.title: Horns
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Horns tiefling druid (D&D Beyond) knows trees’ weak points formerly a general in the Blood War probably not evil - like, probably new and improved, now with wings!

item.title: Iarno Albrek
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Iarno Albrek human wizard, secret leader of The Redbrands under the name Glasstaff. Description Appearnce Personality Biography Key Info Previously a member of the Lord’s Alliance. Secretly the leader of The Redbrands.

item.title: Ignaraz
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Ignaraz Assistant to Carmen (?) who facilitates creation and administration of Tymphal’s Contract with the The Menagerie. Description Appearance First Meeting the Party a female spined devil, with white spines.

item.title: Ivor Borst
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Ivor Borst human barbarian no door is safe Loviatar - wait, WHAT Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: JSON
item.description: Import Campaign Characters JSON wood elf bard out on tour the greatest insult to black puddings Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Keith Stone
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Keith Stone Stone Giant that provides hospitality for the party on the Road of Cinders. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Kithri Tealeaf
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Kithri Tealeaf halfling rogue surprisingly nice, for a rogue Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Mindartis
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Mindartis wood elf rogue master looter somewhere else Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Mirna Dendrar
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Mirna Dendrar Description Human commoner from Phandalin Biography When she was a young girl, she and her family fled from the town of Thundertree after undead overran the place.

item.title: Nezznar, The Black Spider
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Nezznar, The Black Spider Description drow wizard (deceased) Biography Key Info defeated by the party in The Wave Echo Cave Relationships Quotations Trivia source of Gimble’s Spider Staff

item.title: Nundro Rockseeker
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Nundro Rockseeker Nundro Rockseeker was one of the three dwarf brothers who rediscovered Wave Echo Cave. Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships younger brother to Gundren Rockseeker younger brother to Tharden Rockseeker Key Info slain in The Wave Echo Cave by forces of The Black Spider Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Oneshoe
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Oneshoe Gnome Rogue/Warlock (D&D Beyond) professional detective business owner don’t ask about the other shoe goddammit Harold Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Orsik Stoneskin
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Orsik Stoneskin dwarf monk is he still at Old Owl Well? Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Reidoth
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Reidoth Description Reidoth is a gaunt, white-bearded human who doesn’t use two words when one word will do. Though he receives very few visitors, he is reasonably hospitable.

item.title: Rinn'thalas Liadon
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Rinn’thalas Liadon Wood Elf Horizon Walker Ranger DND Beyond Description Appearance Personality Biography Background With Menagerie in Baator Relationships Ze’brak Gorstag Character Info Quests Deliver a letter to the party (a favor for Gorstag orchestrated by Gimble) Find his lost friend, Ze’brak Notable Items Quotations Trivia

item.title: Rinn'thalas Liadon
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Rinn’thalas Liadon Wood Elf Horizon Walker Ranger DND Beyond Description Appearance Personality Biography Background With Menagerie in Baator Relationships Ze’brak Gorstag Character Info Quests Deliver a letter to the party (a favor for Gorstag orchestrated by Gimble) Find his lost friend, Ze’brak Notable Items Quotations Trivia

item.title: Sildar Hallwinter
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Sildar Hallwinter Human soldier and member of the Lords’ Alliance who accompanies Gundren Rockseeker on travel from Neverwinter to Phandalin. Description Appearance Personality Seemed sincere in his desire to help the townsfolk of Phandalin.

item.title: Sister Garaele
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Sister Garaele Description Elf cleric of Tymora who tends the Luck Shrine in town. Biography Key Info member of The Harpers sent party on a quest to get information from a banshee named Agatha about the location of Bowgentle’s spellbook Relationships Gimble Taught Gimble the ritual for Gentle Repose Quotations Trivia

item.title: Tharden Rockseeker
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Tharden Rockseeker Tharden Rockseeker was one of the three dwarf brothers who rediscovered Wave Echo Cave. Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships older brother to Gundren Rockseeker older brother to Nundro Rockseeker Key Info The dwarf was slain by forces under the command of Nezznar, The Black Spider.

item.title: That time Val tried to murder Gimble
item.description: Gimble the Diviner That time Val tried to murder Gimble When the party became 5th level, Gimble had a premonition that he would very soon need the ability to fly. Obsessed with this, he absentmindedly plucked a feather from Val’s new Giant Owl form for a spell component to aid in his furious study.

item.title: The Tinkerer
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Harold Peters You know, the Tinkerer. Description Appearance Personality Biography Originally from the Sword Coast, Harold Peters (you know, the Tinkerer) somehow found himself lost in Shadow Leilon.

item.title: Tymphal's Contract
item.description: CONTRACTED WORK AGREEMENT This Contracted Work Agreement (the “Agreement”) is entered into by and between TYMPHAL (the “Client”) and , (the “Mortals”), collectively “the Parties.” THEREFORE, the Parties agree as follows:

item.title: Val
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Val wood elf druid (D&D Beyond) never surprised flexible morality a real dwarf’s elf some kind of royalty Description Appearance Personality Biography Born as Nadyantal’laval Has a brother, Elirion’tar.

item.title: Zane a Presque Du'Cal
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Zane a Presque Du’Cal half-elf bard deceased savaged by a Grey wolf misguider of innocents Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Zed
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Zed half-orc paladin (D&D Beyond) kindle the yoga powerful thighs “Bullwinkle take the wheel” the puns start coming and they never stop coming and they never stop coming and they never stop coming Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Character Information Quotations Trivia References
